page.title: 01Introductory Page -Darfield
page.content: Darfield is a large village on the outskirts of Barnsley.In the village are about 9000 people.It is a friendly village with lots of pubs and clubs. Darfield is surrounded by countryside and other small villages. It is a mining village with a strong sporting tradition. An annual gala is held on the big field for cubs ,guides and the community.Old people are cared for in residential and sheltered homes. In the centre of the village there are a few shops. The village has been considerably enlarged by the building of a new housing estate. I have lived in Darfield all my life and I am twelve,so there is no way I would want to move as I like it so much.
